comments: Is a subset of the triangular numbers (A000217) because (prime(n)^2-1)/8 = ((2m+1)^2-1)/8 = m(m+1)/2 where p=2m+1 for a given m. - _David Morales Marciel_, Oct 07 2015
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
formula: a(n) = A000217(A005097(n-1)). - after first comment, _Michel Marcus_, Oct 07 2015
mathematica: f[n_]:=(Prime[n]^2-1)/8; Array[f,66,2] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 06 2009 *)(#^2-1)/8&/@Prime[Range[2,50]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 16 2012 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_, May 28 2001
